value.title: Mayo Clinic Assessing Google AI Tool as It Seeks More Insights From Patient Records
value.excerpt: Mayo Clinic said it is assessing a product from Google Cloud that uses artificial intelligence to better track and analyze language-based information in patients’ electronic health records, such as doctor’s notes.

value.title: Ontology of the everyday: PeopleReign's automation of IT and HR
value.excerpt: Automating language is not magic; it can take years of careful work to piece together what people mean in the context of corporate help desks, HR programs and the like. Such is the work of startup PeopleReign.

value.title: Microsoft improves Translator and Azure AI services with new AI 'Z-code' models
value.excerpt: Microsoft's new Z-code models, which use a 'Mixture of Experts' approach, are meant to make Translator and other Microsoft AI services perform better and be more efficient to run.

value.title: Ukraine and Russia have both weaponized facial recognition — in very different ways

value.title: Apple Wins Appeal Against Speech Recognition Patent in Siri Suit
value.excerpt: The Federal Circuit summarily affirmed an administrative tribunal ruling that nixed part of a patent that Apple Inc. was accused of infringing with its Siri technology.

value.title: How Language Software Can Strengthen Our Cyberdefenses
